body:
As in #5657 :bowing_man: to anybody reviewing this.

You can view the documentation locally by fetching this PR and:
```console
$ cd lib/spack/docs
$ make
$ <your-favorite-browser> _build/html/index.html
```

##### Modifications

- [x] Added a section of the tutorial that covers Spec's build-interface and `setup_*` callbacks
- [x] Uploaded image on Dockerhub
- [ ] Added the Dockerfile used to build the image
title: SC17: advanced packaging tutorial
